original_title: ワタシに潜む淫モラル 波多野結衣
overview: Yui is a psychiatrist, and she has a trouble herself, that is, she has an extremely adulterous personality, which often surfaced when she had sex. Yui’s colleague’s boyfriend suggested using "impact therapy" to get Yui close to a male patient with specific idiosyncrasies. Finally, the second personality of the pure Yui's soul sleeping underneath, the sexual beast "Yuka" finally fully awakened!
title: The Debauched Morals Lurking Inside Me Yui Hatano
